DOC.brief_title: Effect 2-year Administration CP-945,598 Weight Loss Efficacy Safety .
DOC.detailed_description: The CP-945,598 program terminate November 3 , 2008 due change regulatory perspective risk/benefit profile CB1 class likely new regulatory requirement approval . No safety issue involve termination decision .
DOC.criteria: Obese adult body mass index > = 30 kg/m ; > = 27 kg/m2 obesityrelated comorbidities include hypertension dyslipidemia Pregnancy Diabetes Adults serious unstable current past medical condition
